message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really love. I'm thinking of a price of $15000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see that you're willing to make a serious offer, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $12000. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $14000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $12000?
